articles.author: Tyrone Marshall
articles.title: UEFA set to punish Manchester United and Man City for European Super League plans - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Man Utd and Manchester City were among 12 clubs to commit to a European Super League project but they now face UEFA sanctions.
articles.content:
UEFA president Aleksander Ceferin has confirmed the 12 clubs involved in the European Super League breakaway are set to face sanctions from the governing body.
Manchester United and Manchester City … [+2671 chars]

articles.author: CNA
articles.title: Football: Arsenal great Henry says he no longer recognises the club - CNA
articles.description: LONDON: Former Arsenal striker Thierry Henry said he does not recognise the north London club anymore following their failed attempt to join the European Super League and hailed supporters for their role in the collapse of the competition.

articles.author: James Davey
articles.title: Half of U.K. population has had first COVID-19 vaccine dose, official says - Global News
articles.description: Britain's vaccine rollout, which has raced ahead of countries in the European Union, means it is on track to ease lockdown measures and re-open the economy in line with its plan.
articles.content:
The United Kingdom has reached another COVID-19 vaccination milestone with over half of the population having had at least one injection, health secretary Matt Hancock said on Saturday.
